Subscription.Query: <QueryList><Query Id="0" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4715 or EventID=4817 or EventID=4656 or EventID=4658 or EventID=4660 or EventID=4663 or EventID=4670)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="1" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4688)]]</Select><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4689)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="2" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4657)]] and ((*[EventData[Data[@Name="OperationType"] = "%%1904"]]) or (*[EventData[Data[@Name="OperationType"] = "%%1905"]]) or (*[EventData[Data[@Name="OperationType"] = "%%1906"]]))</Select></Query><Query Id="3" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4616)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="4" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4610 or EventID=4611 or EventID=4614 or EventID=4622 or EventID=4697)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="5" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4719 or EventID=4817 or EventID=4902 or EventID=4906 or EventID=4908 or EventID=4912 or EventID=4904 or EventID=4905)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="6" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID >=4698 and EventID <=4702)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="7" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=5632 or EventID=5633)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="8" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID >=4944 and EventID <=4954)]]</Select><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID >=4956 and EventID <=4958)]]</Select></Query></QueryList>
